traidingTools.title: DCA Bot
traidingTools.description: No need to risk it all! Instead of investing a lump sum with unknown risks, the bot will invest the amount partially with maximum benefit.

traidingTools.title: Grid Bot
traidingTools.description: This bot will trade for you 24/7 making the most of market fluctuations. Its crucial skill is to buy low and sell high

traidingTools.title: Options Bot
traidingTools.description: Do you want to wait months for your gain? There is no doubt that the answer is no. At first glance, the Options bot might seem a little bit difficult to understand. However, its high speed and profitability will cover the time you need to learn it.

traidingTools.title: Hold Bot
traidingTools.description: Based on the principle of temporal DCA, it will buy the coin you choose to invest using an interval that suits you best!

traidingTools.title: Cluster of Bots
traidingTools.description: All the bots can be run simultaneously, complementing each other to ensure the best result.

traidingTools.title: Automated Settings
traidingTools.description: Easy automated bot configuration is always up to date with the current situation on the market. Less time â€” more profit!

allTools.title: Smart Trade
allTools.text: Smart and optimized algorithm for each bot will make trading as profitable as possible

allTools.title: TradingView
allTools.text: Many built-in indicators for market analysis will turn complex analysis processes into an exciting game.

allTools.title: Exchanges
allTools.text: The system works only with the most reliable trading platforms.

allTools.title: Enterprise
allTools.text: Manage multiple investment portfolios and accounts through one interface.

allTools.title: Trading Terminal
allTools.text: Profitable trading with a scalping strategy.

allTools.title: State of the system
allTools.text: Smooth functioning 24/7 does everything possible to increase your assets at any time.
